law.catch_line: Payment of allowances authorized by KRS 6.211.
law.text: The secretary of the Finance and Administration Cabinet shall, on the first and fifteenth day of each month, during the time the General Assembly is in regular or extraordinary session, draw his warrant on the Treasurer in favor of each member of the General Assembly for the sums set forth in KRS 6.211. These sums shall be paid from the general fund.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 486, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(2). -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 2.
